title: Banned from forum reading?
body: So, I'm on mobile right now and I have been RPing a certain swearing yordle riding a lizard on here, see. This certain topic was supposed to be 'in character', so, I had to be a raging southern a-hole that swore a lot. For some reason now, I can't see any forums even if I log out. I'm not sure if it's because I'm on mobile or anything, but if someone reported me for that, I honestly will be mad. I didn't even pull out the big ones. I don't know if this'll get through or not, but if this is an unjust forum ban, I can assure you that it's justified, even if it is ridiculous.

replies.body: I'm fine now. It was weird though. Couldn't read any section of the boards at all, but it passed after an hour or so.

A forum suspension would count towards the entirety of the boards and not just one section of it, so it looks like you're okay.  Might just be the mobile version!  Are you still having issues with this?
